messages.content: What is the function of the PlusMinusTextClip node in ComfyUI?
The PlusMinusTextClip node adds both the positive and negative prompts as input in one node, eliminating the need for two separate nodes for positive and negative prompts.
How can I add the PlusMinusTextClip node to my ComfyUI app?

To add the PlusMinusTextClip node, you need to clone the git repository in the `custom_nodes` folder using the command `git clone https://github.com/shobhitic/ComfyUI-PlusMinusTextClip.git`. After cloning is complete, restart the ComfyUI app, and you will have the option to add this node by searching for `PlusMinusTextClip` after double-clicking on empty space.
What is the visualization of the PlusMinusTextClip node?
The PlusMinusTextClip node's visualization is not provided here, but it includes input ports for the positive and negative prompts and an output port.
How can I resolve any issues with the PlusMinusTextClip node?
Any issues with the PlusMinusTextClip node can be resolved by reporting them on GitHub.
What is the default name of the PlusMinusTextClip node?
The default name for the PlusMinusTextClip node is not mentioned in the provided document content.
What version of ComfyUI is compatible with the PlusMinusTextClip node?
The provided document content does not specify the compatible version of ComfyUI for the PlusMinusTextClip node.
What is the purpose of the variation_seed and seed parameters in the cg-noise node?

The variation_seed and seed parameters in the cg-noise node are used for generating noise variations. variation_seed is used in the formula `random_based_on(variation_seed) * x + random_based_on(seed) * (1-x)` while the seed determines the base noise.
Can we modify the PlusMinusTextClip node to output boolean results?
The provided document content does not mention the capability or possibility of modifying the PlusMinusTextClip node to output boolean results.
What are the input parameters for the cg-noise node?
The cg-noise node takes two input parameters: variation_seed and seed. The variation_seed influences the noise, affecting the choice between the original noise and the same noise minus the x portion.
What makes the PlusMinusTextClip node stand out from other nodes in ComfyUI?
The PlusMinusTextClip node simplifies prompt processing, offering functionality from two nodes bundled into one. This can save the user time, space, and effort.
